attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The executives have clearly not run these businesses in the best interests of the company, (as they are charged with) but in there own Very short term benefits. Anyone who can earn enough money over one year to retire very handsomely, is not motivated for the longer term. This is more than amply proved by the current economic crisis.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
